title: SEO Basics - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Cyrus Shepard February 25, 2020 Are H1 Tags Necessary for Ranking? [SEO Experiment] SEO Basics | Technical SEO In earlier days of search marketing, SEOs often heard the same two best practices repeated so many times it became implanted in our brains: Wrap the title of your page in H1 tags and use only one H1 tag per page. Despite assertions from one of Google's most trusted authorities that sites "can do perfectly fine with no H1 tags or with five H1 tags", many SEOs didn't believe it. So of course, we decided to test it scientifically. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard September 10, 2019 How Google's Rel = Nofollow, Sponsored, & UGC Links Impact SEO On-page SEO | Technical SEO | SEO Basics Google shook up the SEO world by announcing big changes to how publishers should mark nofollow links. The changes — while beneficial to help Google understand the web — nonetheless caused confusion and raised a number of questions. We've got the answers to many of your questions here. Read this post L By: Lorna_Franklin September 3, 2019 Amazon vs. Google: Decoding the World's Largest E-commerce Search Engine E-Commerce SEO | SEO Basics Google and Amazon have two very different business models. Knowing the difference between what drives their algorithms will help you better approach SEO on the two platforms. Read this post By: Kameron Jenkins August 28, 2019 How to Use Keywords in Your Blogging Strategy Keyword Research | SEO Basics | Blogging [Using Keywords In Blog] If you're an established blogger new to SEO, you'll benefit from this primer on how keyword research can help your BLOG show up on Google and get in front of readers who'll care about your content. Read this post By: Kameron Jenkins August 14, 2019 How to Get Started Building Links for SEO SEO Basics | Link Building If you're just getting started with link building, here's a quick overview of the basics, as well as actionable tips & resources to jumpstart your efforts. Read this post K By: Kate Morris July 24, 2019 The Ultimate Guide to SEO Meta Tags Search Engines | On-page SEO | SEO Basics In 2019, meta tags are still important. But which meta tags are absolutely necessary, which are dependent on your situation, and which should you absolutely ignore or remove? Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers July 19, 2019 Aren't 301s, 302s, and Canonicals All Basically the Same? - Best of Whiteboard Friday Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | SEO Basics The answer is unequivocally no. In this fan-favorite Whiteboard Friday, Dr. Pete explains how bots and humans experience pages differently depending on which solution you use, why it matters, and how each choice is treated by Google. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard June 10, 2019 The 61 Best Free SEO Tools [100% Free] SEO Tools | Technical SEO | SEO Basics There are literally hundreds of free SEO tools out there, so we focused on only the best and most useful to add to your toolbox. Read this post By: Brian Childs May 1, 2019 Announcing the New Moz SEO Essentials Certification: What It Is & How to Get Certified Moz News | SEO Basics Does Moz offer an SEO certification? As of today, the answer is an enthusiastic YES! Check out the details on our new SEO Essentials certification and how you can earn shiny new credentials to show off on your LinkedIn profile. Read this post By: Felicia Crawford April 1, 2019 Now Live for Your SEO Learning Pleasure: The NEW Beginner's Guide to SEO! SEO Basics | Moz News It's here! It's here! The brand-new Beginner's Guide to SEO is live and ready to teach another generation of SEOs all about how to optimize sites for both searchers and search engines alike. Read this post By: Paola-Didone March 26, 2019 The 5 SEO Recommendations That Matter in the End SEO Basics | Search Engines | On-page SEO SEO is an ever-changing game. Here are 5 things that I consider to be evergreen SEO recommendations. Read this post By: Samuel Mangialavori February 11, 2019 How to Identify and Tackle Keyword Cannibalization in 2019 On-page SEO | Content Marketing | SEO Basics Learn how to find and fix keyword cannibalisation before it impacts your SEO opportunities. Read this post By: Roger MozBot February 11, 2019 People Ask Their Most Pressing SEO Questions — Our Experts Answer SEO Basics We teamed up with the good folks at Duda to answer their customers' biggest SEO questions. Read on for insights on topics like international SEO, how much content is enough content, optimizing for voice search, and more! Read this post By: Kameron Jenkins February 11, 2019 Communicating to Clients & Stakeholders in a Constantly Changing SEO Landscape SEO Consulting | SEO Basics Setting the right expectations early can help manage client and stakeholder anxiety when change happens. This 11-point checklist will help you develop highly effective, good-sense strategies for better communication! Read this post
